name: Tee Timing
description:
This is my entry for Trijam #156 The 3 hour game jam! This club has had a issue of slow golf players so they have decided to enforce all players to play through the course on beat,  play through 3 challenging courses trying to perfect your line to complete it in the least amount of strokes.

- How to Play -

The goal is too complete the 3 hole course within the least amount of strokes possible, a circle will appear around the ball and slowly close in if you don't do anything it will add a stroke if you try to swing at it while it is not within one of the inner circles around the ball it will be considered a stroke and if you hit it it will be considered a stroke. 

You can hit the ball at one of two strengths depending on timing of when you time your shot. 

Space bar to shoot
